name: Project Zetka: Early Demo
description:
Project Zetka is a simple, retro-styled game.

Choose a character to start a little adventure in unknown places. Depending on a character you chose, the game will be in different style. This means you can play it in the platformer, RPG or fighting style! In addition, you can find extra codes in the game. Use them to unlock more content!

The game is in early development, there are lots of things to change and add. The demo is just a little part of what I'm working at right now, so stay tuned for more updates and "leaked" builds!
